name: The Hellchemist
description:
Picture:

Flavor Text:

In a world ravaged by wars, people sought shelter underground but some dug too deep and too greedily, now they must fight in the arena of The Sun God to prove their worth.The Hellchemist is an intense pve arena shooter where you will fight waves of monsters while one completely random event will happen every 10 seconds. The game is heavily inspired by Doom, Quake and Devil Daggers.

Hellchemist Features:

  • Test your might against many unique enemies.
  • Kill said enemies with a wide variety of weapons.
  • Random Events that change the game every 10 seconds.
  • Ever evolving play area.
  • Survive Long enough to reach the top of the Leaderboard.
  • Old school movement that allows for bunny hops and speed boosts.
  • Modernized old school graphics.
  • Intense Heavy Metal Music Created by Meithius.
  • Explosions
